document_data.name: Body Switch
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite dragon annual/1997/The magic of Myth Drannor|91}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Body switch''''' was a [[spell]] that translocated the target with another target in range.
document_data.Effects: The spell swapped the positions of the user and another target within {{SI|1|mile|k|long=yes}} which the caster must have touched at some previous point in time. Alternatively, it could be used to translocate a willing target touched by the caster with another creature within range.
document_data.Components: The spell called for only [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|241}}, when assaulted by [[Symrustar Auglamyr]], a [[Chosen of Mystra]], [[Elminster]] employed this spell to escape and bring a foe of hers, [[Elandorr Waelvor]], to his position.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|207-209|10}}
